data.oai_dc:dc: Teaching evaluations by students at the University of Girona (2014-2016)

The data set contains 11 variables from which one can reproduce the results of the aforementioned paper. The variables can be read as follows:nota: achievement, values from 0 to 10preg1: question 1 in the questionnaire, labelled as STRUC_1, values from 1 to 5preg2: question 2 in the questionnaire, labelled as EFFICACY_1, values from 1 to 5preg3: question 3 in the questionnaire, labelled as AUTON_1, values from 1 to 5preg4: question 4 in the questionnaire, labelled as STRUC_2, values from 1 to 5preg5: question 5 in the questionnaire, labelled as EFFICACY_2, values from 1 to 5preg6: question 6 in the questionnaire, labelled as INVOL_1, values from 1 to 5idassig: subject identification numberyear: academic year, values from 2014 to 2016pdi: lecturer identification numberciencia: area of knowledge =1, Humanities =2, Social Sciences =3, Sciences =4, Life Sciences =5, Medical Sciences =6, Arquitecture / Engineering
